TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Button extends System.Windows.Forms.Button

summary.span: 表示可添加到 Microsoft Office Word 文档的 Windows 窗体按钮。

span.span: Represents a Windows Forms button that can be added to a Microsoft Office Word document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与不同。The is different from a . 具有其他成员, 使其能够添加到 Word 文档中, 并为其提供附加方法和属性。The has additional members that enable it to be added to a Word document and that give it additional methods and properties. 不要使用构造函数来创建新的。Do not use the constructor to create a new . 使用方法向文档中添加一个新的。 Use the method to add a new to a document.

span.span: Activates the .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例将两个控件添加到文档, 然后使用方法以编程方式激活第一个按钮。The following code example adds two controls to a document and then programmatically activates the first button by using the method. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles Anchor { get; set; }

summary.span: 获取 的下边缘与该文档的上边缘之间的距离（以磅为单位）。

span.span: Gets the distance, in points, between the bottom edge of the and the top edge of the document.

value.span: 的下边缘与文档上边缘之间的距离 (以磅为单位)。

span.span: The distance, in points, between the bottom edge of the and the top edge of the document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值等于属性值和属性值的总和。The value of this property is equal to the sum of the property value and the property value. 属性使用点, 而属性使用像素。 The property uses points, whereas the property uses pixels. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 控件的属性。The following code example demonstrates the property of the control. 该示例向文档中添加`sizeButton`了`locationButton`两个名为和的控件。The example adds two controls named `sizeButton` and `locationButton` to a document. 单击`sizeButton`时, 将对和属性进行调整, 以使按钮更改大小。When `sizeButton` is clicked, the and properties are adjusted so that the button changes size. 单击`locationButton`时, 将对和属性进行调整, 以使按钮更改位置。When `locationButton` is clicked, the and properties are adjusted so that the button changes location. 修改每个按钮后, 该示例将在消息框中显示单击按钮的新的、 、、和属性值。After each button is modified, the example displays the new , , , , and property values of the clicked button in a message box. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordWindowsFormsControls#2](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordWindowsFormsControls/CS/ThisDocument.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordWindowsFormsControls#2](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordWindowsFormsControls/VB/ThisDocument.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Delete() cil managed

summary.span: 从该文档中删除动态创建的 并将其从 中移除。

span.span: Deletes a dynamically created from the document and removes it from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法应仅用于在运行时以编程方式创建的。This method should only be used with a that is created programmatically at run time. 如果在设计时添加到文档的上调用此方法, 则会引发异常。An exception is thrown if you call this method on a that is added to the document at design time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个控件, 该控件在用户单击它时将其删除。The following code example demonstrates a control that deletes itself when the user clicks it. 按钮的事件处理程序调用方法以删除按钮。The event handler of the button calls the method to delete the button. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. The height of the in points.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对和属性值所做的更改会导致的属性值发生更改。Changes made to the and property values cause the property value of the to change. 属性使用点, 而属性使用像素。 The property uses points, whereas property uses pixels. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 控件的属性。The following code example demonstrates the property of the control. 该示例向文档中添加`sizeButton`了`locationButton`两个名为和的控件。The example adds two controls named `sizeButton` and `locationButton` to a document. 单击`sizeButton`时, 将对和属性进行调整, 以使按钮更改大小。When `sizeButton` is clicked, the and properties are adjusted so that the button changes size. 单击`locationButton`时, 将对和属性进行调整, 以使按钮更改位置。When `locationButton` is clicked, the and properties are adjusted so that the button changes location. 修改每个按钮后, 该示例将在消息框中显示单击按钮的新的、 、、和属性值。After each button is modified, the example displays the new , , , , and property values of the clicked button in a message box. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. span.span: Gets the underlying of the .
The underlying of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够获取控件在文档中的精确位置。The property enables you to get the exact position of the control on the document. 如果控件的换行样式未设置为 **"随文本对齐**", 则属性将返回`null`。If the wrapping style of the control is not set to **In line with text**, the property returns `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不应使用此方法, 并且不支持此方法。This method should not be used and is not supported. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[Office 文档上 Windows 窗体控件的限制](/visualstudio/vsto/limitations-of-windows-forms-controls-on-office-documents)。For more information, see [Limitations of Windows Forms Controls on Office Documents](/visualstudio/vsto/limitations-of-windows-forms-controls-on-office-documents).
